Reference

All functions

dark

bs_themes for dark mode

get_current_gw_info()

Getting current gameweek information

get_current_gw_number()

Getting current gameweek number

get_ep_for_entrant()

Getting Expected Points for a entrant in a given gameweek

get_ep_for_league()

Getting Expected Points for a league in a given gameweek

get_ep_not_owned()

Getting Expected Points for players not owned

get_fdr_by_gameweek()

Getting fdr table by gameweek

get_fdr_for_selected_gameweek()

Getting fdr table by specific gameweeks

get_league_bench_points()

Getting a table of bench points for a minileague

get_league_general_info()

Getting a table of general information for a minileague's current gw

get_league_historic_standings()

Getting historic league standing

get_league_hits_taken()

Getting a table of hits taken for a minileague

get_league_name()

Getting league name

get_league_team_value()

Getting a table of team value for a minileague

get_next_gw_info()

Getting next gameweek information

get_next_gw_number()

Getting next gameweek number

get_rct_columns()

Getting column list for reactable

get_rct_groups()

Getting column groups for reactable

gt_table_theme()

Getting a gt table theme according to light/darkmode

light

bs_themes for light mode

plot_league_points()

Plotting league points

plot_league_standings()

Plotting league standing

pl_style()

Add pl theme to ggplot chart

reactable_table_theme()

Getting a reactable table theme according to light/darkmode

Run the Shiny Application
